title: China's PC shipments nosedive 6% amid weak demand
description: The country's PC shipments declined by 6%  in Q2, with the consumer and commercial sectors falling by 3 per cent and 9 per cent, respectively, as per a Canalys report. Analyst Emma Xu said that the competitive dynamics of China's PC market are rapidly increasing in complexity.
content: China's PC shipments (including desktops, notebooks and workstations) fell by 6% (year-on-year) to 9.1 million in the April-June quarter as weak demand continued.
